# African-American Film Critics Association Awards 2010

Winners for the 2010 African-American Film Critics Association.
Best Picture
Winner: The Social Network
Top 10 Pictures:
#The Social Network
#The King's Speech
#Inception
#Black Swan
#Night Catches Us
#The Fighter
#Frankie & Alice
#Blood Done Sign My Name
#Get Low
#For Colored Girls
